column4: System Monitor can show your disk usage, in the File Systems tab.
I have two OS installed at this machine. And I can see /dev/loop0 and /dev/sda2 devices, would it be one for each system?
/dev/sda2 will be your rootfs.  The other OSs space and usage will not be shown.
well but the sum of both devices is almost my HDD size. :P
